themes.bare.backend.config.theme_descrip: Theme structure without CSS and JavaScript
themes.bare.backend.config.author: shopware AG
themes.bare.backend.config.display_sideb: Display navigation as a sidebar to the left of the product listing.
themes.bare.backend.config.checkout_head: Show checkout steps in a simplified header during the checkout process – otherwise a normal header will be shown.
themes.bare.backend.config.checkout_foot: Show checkout steps in a simplified footer, displaying only the most important information.
themes.bare.backend.config.enable_infini: Dynamically extend the listing on scroll down.
themes.bare.backend.config.infinite_thre: Number of pages for infinite scrolling
Number of pages which will be loaded automaticly caused by infinite scrolling.
themes.bare.backend.config.lightbox_zoom: Scale factor of the picture box (lightbox)
Defines the maximum scale factor for the lightbox. When set to 'Automatic', the limit is set to the size of the original image to prevent blurring.
themes.bare.backend.config.focus_search_: Display the search bar on the home page in mobile view.
themes.bare.backend.config.ajax_variant_: If active, variants will now be loaded dynamically instead of reloading the page.
themes.bare.backend.config.apple_touch_i: If checked, iOS will not apply any glass effects to your Apple Touch Icon.
themes.bare.backend.config.bare_min_appe: Disables all unnecessary features of the bare theme. The sidebar and all sliders will not be shown.
themes.bare.backend.config.bare_max_appe: Enables all additional features of the bare theme. Sliders, shopping worlds and sidebars will be shown in the frontend.
themes.bare.backend.config.offcanvas_mov: Overlay the shop page instead of moving it to the side.
themes.bare.backend.config.show_filter_i: Displays the listing filters in the sidebar below the menu. If the sidebar is not active, the filters are not displayed.
themes.bare.backend.config.async_javascr: If active, JavaScript files will be loaded asynchronously.
themes.responsive.backend.config.author: shopware AG
themes.responsive.backend.config.additio: Use this field to include external services like Google Fonts.
Use this field to include scripts like Google Analytics or other external services. Please include local JavaScript components by using the $javascript array
